pages.text: $(bred)PeaShooter Zombie$() is a Normal Zombie with PeaShooter's head.$(br)$(bred)Health$() : $(l)20$()$(br)$(bred)Eat Damage$() : $(l)Low$()$(br)$(bblue)Speed$() : $(l)Normal$()$(br)$(l)Features$() : It can periodically fire peas at the enemy, $(l)one pea per shot$(). When it's in water, it will wear a $(byellow)ducky tube$() to speed up.
